trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event occurs when a smart tag panel is displayed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>智慧標籤面板中顯示或隱藏時，就會發生事件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>

trans-unit.source: This event is not generated directly by the panel but rather by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> class when its <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> methods are executed.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件不會產生直接根據面板但而不是由<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>類別時其<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A>方法會執行。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event, the `relatedObject` parameter always references the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName> that the panel is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>事件，`relatedObject`參數一律參考<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName>面板與其相關聯。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: The object that is associated with the panel.
A value that specifies whether the panel is being displayed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: 值，指定是否要在 [面板] 中顯示或隱藏。

trans-unit.source: Gets a flag indicating whether the smart tag panel is being displayed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: 取得旗標，表示智慧標籤面板是否要顯示或隱藏。

trans-unit.source: If the panel is being hidden through a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> method, this property has a value of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果已透過呼叫的<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A>方法，這個屬性的值為<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType></xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A>隱藏面板

trans-unit.source: If the panel is being shown through a call to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>, this property has a value of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果透過呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>，這個屬性的值為<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType></xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>正在顯示面板

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType"></xref> that indicates the state of the panel.
Gets the object that is associated with the smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: 取得的智慧標籤面板與相關聯的物件。

trans-unit.source: The RelatedObject property enables the programmer to associate an object to an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: RelatedObject 屬性可讓程式設計人員相關聯的物件執行個體的<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs>類別。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: This object then is available to methods that handle the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event.
trans-unit.target: 此物件則是可以處理方法<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>事件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> associated with the smart tag panel.
